meanings.definition: To throw or hurl with force.
meanings.sent1: He was lanching the ball across the field.
meanings.sent2: She lanching the stone into the pond.
meanings.sent3: The monkey was lanching bananas at the zoo visitors.
meanings.sent4: The storm was lanching raindrops against the window.
meanings.sent5: The pitcher lanching fastballs at the batter with precision.

meanings.sent1: The cat was lanching after the mouse.
meanings.sent2: The car lanching down the road at top speed.
meanings.sent3: The kids were lanching around the playground in excitement.
meanings.sent4: The wind was lanching through the trees on a stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The athlete was lanching towards the finish line with determination.

meanings.sent1: She was lanching a new project at work.
meanings.sent2: The teacher lanching the lesson with an interesting story.
meanings.sent3: The magician was lanching his magic show with a grand entrance.
meanings.sent4: The CEO was lanching a new product line for the company.
meanings.sent5: The conductor lanching the orchestra's performance with a wave of his baton.
